imagerecognition
Class ImageRecognition

java.lang.Object
  imagerecognition.ImageRecognition

public class ImageRecognition
extends java.lang.Object

ImageRecognition

This class provides the image recognition algorithms needed to recognise features of the satellite from the imaging sensor on the dock

Since:
2015-04-08
Version:
2.1
Author:
Matt Thorne

Get the adjustment required for the docking face based on two specified images

Parameters:

Returns:
Double representing the offset in degrees required to align the docking plates

isLOSFeatureInBoundary

public boolean isLOSFeatureInBoundary(int boundaryPercentage)
Check if the satellite is still within boundary

Parameters:
boundaryPercentage - dangerzone boundary as a percentage of overall image
Returns:
true if satellite is within boundary false if it is lost or out of bounds

isSatelliteLost

public boolean isSatelliteLost()
Check if the satellite has been lost

Returns:
true if satellite is lost false if it is still in LOS

checkBoundary

private boolean checkBoundary(Feature feature,
                              int boundaryPC)
Check if the detected feature is in the dangerzone

Parameters:
feature - feature to be boundary checked
boundaryPC - dangerzone boundary as a percentage of overall image
Returns:
true feature is in the safe zone false feature is in the dangerzone
